sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>rm_story</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="rm_story">group_rankVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="group_rank" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Handle group rank update</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if(current.assignment_group.nil()){ gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Group rank can be provided only when Assignment Group is specified on the story')); current.setAbortAction(true); } else { if(typeof groupRankUpdateSysId === 'undefined' || groupRankUpdateSysId == null){ groupRankUpdateSysId = current.sys_id; } if(groupRankUpdateSysId == current.sys_id){ var api = new AgileStoryRankingAPI(); var groupStoriesWithRank = api.getGroupRankObject(current.assignment_group); //When Rank is changed from null to a new value getGroupRankObject //wouldn't include current record as we are querying on rank!=NULL, so add it here if(previous.group_rank.nil() || previous.getValue('group_rank') === '0') groupStoriesWithRank.push({"key":current.getValue("sys_id"), "rank":parseInt(previous.group_rank), "isDirty":false}); api.updateRanks(groupStoriesWithRank, current.getValue('sys_id'), parseInt(current.getValue('group_rank')), 'group_rank'); groupRankUpdateSysId = ''; } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-11-28 13:32:45</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>13cf0cfe0b532200a6acc93563673a55</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Handle group rank update</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">bb31d11d93f08210b31a30dcebba1022</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_13cf0cfe0b532200a6acc93563673a55</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-08-03 00:31:50</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=13cf0cfe0b532200a6acc93563673a55"/> </record_update>
